page.shortlink: api client api a5 edit insert method

argument.name: element
argument.description: The INPUT or TEXTAREA element to insert the value into.

argument.name: start
argument.description: Optionally set the selection start for inserting. If no value is passed in then the current selection is used. See *[link:A5.edit.setSelection]*.

argument.name: end
argument.description: Optionally set the selection end for inserting. See *[link:A5.edit.setSelection]*.

page.description: Insert a value into an edit control (INPUT or TEXTAREA).

discussion.p: The A5.edit.insert method allows for the inserting of a text value into an INPUT or TEXTAREA. The insert method will honor the undo stack, meaning that the user can undo changes done by the insert.
